channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #ja @ 1497572421330636800
item.description: ポーランド日本大使館は既にメールで連絡済みです！ ウクライナからポーランドへの入国は日本人はコロナ感染症の入国規制は解除されています。ポーランドへの脱出を促しています。 https://t.co/KOxWgmkjRo https://t.co/Igr0Kl6xfY

item.title: #en @ 1497566645358940165
item.description: The point of linked open data is to create a distributive, open dialogue through data & citation. The point of Reading Rainbow / libraries is further pathways to reading rather than cul-de-sacs. =Most Digital Humanities work is simply applied philosophy with differing media. 👋

https://t.co/rFUIWjbFXh

I #dati #aperti e veloci fanno la differenza https://t.co/WQi1vtdFqT https://t.co/4AL7wbFssj

item.title: #ja @ 1497478366060236802
item.description:
参考までに、気象庁HPでは 火山ごとの日別地震回数を発表しています。 12月28日～の御嶽山の状況を見てみると １日あたり０～２回が中心となっているので、 火山性地震の回数が増えていることがわかります。
噴煙の高さ情報などもあるので、よろしければこちらから。 https://t.co/BQ13zw8dki https://t.co/L4n0BxZco5

item.title: #en @ 1497275760792461318
item.description:
#ClosingtheGap on Procurement
Learn what Ecuador and Paraguay did differently in their COVID-19 response.
Both developed COVID-19-related open data portals and increased transparency in public procurement which led to greater public scrutiny of government contracts.
Thread! https://t.co/bul10OPhj8

item.title: #en @ 1496928399117684736
item.description: Question for @AAS_Publishing : since AAS journals are all open access now (🎉!), are all machine-readable tables similarly "open data" by policy? And if so... can the links to them be made permanent? Right now MRT links expire, so can't be used in reproducible sci workflows

item.title: #en @ 1496785578947457024
item.description:
#Mortality monitoring 🇦🇹, week 6-2022 (7–13 Feb)
No #ExcessMortality, but increased # of deaths in Vienna & Lower 🇦🇹. Please note that our model expects flu deaths in winter that did not occur this season.
Analyses & #OpenData by #StatisticsVienna ➡️ https://t.co/kzgjkaBO8y https://t.co/1jQhtFyrVO
